title: The Unsheltered
description: "The Curse of Seabrea" released in the UK and in the US under the title "The Unsheltered". [A dramatic and suspenseful novel set in a small coastal town in Maine.]AN EXTRAORDINARY NOVEL-THE STORY OF THE PASSION AND PATHOLOGICAL HATE OF SARE KING. THE MOST FASCINATING YOUNG HEROINE IN GOTHIC FICTION.SARE KING WAS INSATIABLE.She was as wild, beautiful and relentless as the sea she loved. And she was possessed by a demon which would not be appeased until Seabrea was rebuilt over the charred remains of the town of Cap Roque.They had killed her mother, the only person Sare King ever loved. Now, they nakedly coveted Seabrea, the neglected hilltop estate â€” her last possession. Mobilized by hate, Sare King struck out. Her target was an entire community. Her weapon was her breathtaking beauty.Four violent deaths . . .A town terrorized by a force they could barely comprehend . . .THEY CALLED IT THE CURSE OF SEABREA.And it would remain as long as Sare King lived.
author: Dewey Ward
